title: Define Project Requirements and Architecture (Updated)
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the GlobalDataSync project, including performance, scalability, availability, and security goals. Design the overall system architecture, focusing on a GraphQL API layer, data synchronization mechanisms (real-time, sharding, and data consistency), load balancers, databases, caching, and edge cases/error handling/performance optimizations. Propose modular and maintainable code organization, including clear module dependencies and interfaces. Ensure documentation for each component and its interaction with others. Consider using existing libraries and tools to streamline development, adhere to best practices, and leverage GraphQL subscriptions for real-time data updates. Upon completion of the design phase, submit this RFC for review by the Project Manager, technical team, and specifically the Code Architect. To further improve, provide examples of similar projects or case studies that can serve as references, and discuss potential challenges and proposed solutions related to sharding, data consistency, and real-time updates. Update the rfc_state field if this RFC is ready for review by the Code Architect. Assign task to 'code-architect' for further review.

title: Design and Implement GraphQL API
description: Design and implement the GraphQL API layer, including schema definition, resolvers, and integration with the data synchronization layer. Ensure low-latency and high availability across multiple regions.

title: Design and Implement Data Synchronization
description: Design and implement the active-active real-time data synchronization mechanism across multiple regions, ensuring data consistency and fault tolerance.

title: Infrastructure Setup and Deployment
description: Set up the infrastructure for hosting the GraphQL API and data synchronization components across multiple regions, ensuring high availability and scalability. Automate the deployment process.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Perform security audits and ensure compliance with relevant regulations and best practices for data protection and access control.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute testing for the GraphQL API, data synchronization, and overall system functionality, including performance, scalability, and fault tolerance testing.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the GlobalDataSync system, including API documentation, deployment guides, and user manuals. Establish support channels and processes for users and customers.

title: Project Management and Coordination
description: Coordinate and manage the overall project, including task assignment, progress tracking, risk management, and stakeholder communication.
